# ICWSM
This repository contains the core analytical pipeline and a sample dataset for our research on the "Spirited Girls" (Á≤æÁ•ûÂ∞èÂ¶π) subculture on Douyin. This study utilizes a large-scale dataset of over 330,000 comments to uncover how socio-economic structures and regional cultural inertia drive digital subcultural discourse.

## üìä Data Description (Datasheet Snippet)
The provided 10% sample contains the following anonymized fields:

Textual Content: Normalized comment text (Emoji-to-text conversion applied).

Provincial IP: IP-based provincial geolocation.

Like Count: Number of likes for weighted resonance analysis.

Timestamp: Post time (Range: 2022-09-07 to 2025-05-20).
